novice

Class NedFileHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • novice.NedFileHeader

  • public class NedFileHeader
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class NedFileHeader.

    Tools for reading and defining the Header (.hdr) files of Nation Elevation Database (NED) File (.ftl).

    Since:
    April 13, 2014

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NedFileHeader(java.io.File data)
      Instantiates a new NED File Header.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NedFileHeader

        public NedFileHeader(java.io.File data)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Instantiates a new NED File Header. Assumes that the header files (.hdr) is in the same directory as the GridFloat file (.ftl).
        Parameters:
        data - of NED file (.ftl)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
